APRS List of HF freqency offsets for the global APRS HF frequencies.

                 Virtual Carrier  	Audio	Frequencies
                 	7034.30	10149.30	Mark	Space

Bell 103 Orig LSB	7035.47	10150.47	1070	1270
Bell 103 Orig USB	7033.13	10148.13	1070	1270

Tig TM1 LSB		7035.50	10150.50	1100	1300
Tig TM1 USB		7033.10	10148.10	1100	1300

MFJ1270 LSB		7036.00	10151.00	1600	1800
MFJ1270 USB		7032.60	10147.60	1600	1800

KamPlus LSB		7036.00	10151.00	1600	1800
KamPlus USB		7032.60	10147.60	1600	1800

Bell 103 Answ LSB	7036.43	10151.43	2025	2225
Bell 103 Answ USB	7032.18	10147.18	2025	2225

MFJ1278 LSB		7036.50	10151.50	2100	2300
MFJ1278 USB		7032.10	10147.10	2100	2300

PK232 LSB		7036.51	10151.51	2110	2310
PK232 USB		7032.09	10147.09	2110	2310

DSP-12 LSB		7036.53	10151.53	2125	2325
DSP-12 USB		7032.08	10147.08	2125	2325

Mike VK2BMM
